case_title: United States of America v. Wade
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Wade

charges.charge_description: Malicious destruction or attempted destruction by fire of any building or property in or affecting interstate commerce

charges.charge_offence_description: Malicious destruction or attempted destruction by

charges.charge_description: Maliciously damage and destroy and attempt to damage and destroy, by means of fire and explosive materials, a residential rental property in and affecting interstate commerce.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 60 mos. impr., 3 yrs SRT, $100 sp. assmt., fine waived, $825 restitution.
